column4: I have some trouble regarding 11.04 install. I can't find any blank DVDs or flash drive around, but I have a previously burned copy of 10.10. Can I install 10.10 and just get 11.04 through software update, or will it not be as good?
my dad misplaced the stack of blank CDs he bought... so... I'm a bit screwed
you can upgrade, Ive been upgrading for awhile now
there was a project for that on launchpad, but I dont know if it will gain traction
